        <description>Create a new CSP Portal URL Mapping for </description>
        <name>CSP Portal Catalog Item URL Mapping</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var URL_MAPPING_TABLE = "sys_cs_portal_url_mapping";

var RECORD_DESCRIPTION = "CSP Service Catalog Item Record Mapping";
var TYPE = "portal_mapping";
var CATLOG_ITEM_TABLE = "sc_cat_item";
var CATALOG_ITEM_LINK = "/csp?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id={{data.sys_id}}";
var CSP_PORTAL_SYS_ID = "2086b814c3221200f3897bfaa2d3aea8";

var FIELD_NAME_DESCRIPTION = "description";
var FIELD_NAME_TYPE = "type";
var FIELD_NAME_TABLE = "table_name";
var FIELD_NAME_VALUE = "url_template";
var FIELD_NAME_PORTAL = "portal";


var urlMappingRecord = new GlideRecord(URL_MAPPING_TABLE);
urlMappingRecord.addQuery(FIELD_NAME_PORTAL, CSP_PORTAL_SYS_ID);
urlMappingRecord.addQuery(FIELD_NAME_TABLE, CATLOG_ITEM_TABLE);
urlMappingRecord.addQuery(FIELD_NAME_TYPE, TYPE);
urlMappingRecord.query();
if(urlMappingRecord.getRowCount() == 0){
	urlMappingRecord.initialize();
	urlMappingRecord.setValue(FIELD_NAME_DESCRIPTION, RECORD_DESCRIPTION);
	urlMappingRecord.setValue(FIELD_NAME_TYPE, TYPE);
	urlMappingRecord.setValue(FIELD_NAME_TABLE, CATLOG_ITEM_TABLE);
	urlMappingRecord.setValue(FIELD_NAME_VALUE, CATALOG_ITEM_LINK);
	urlMappingRecord.setValue(FIELD_NAME_PORTAL, CSP_PORTAL_SYS_ID);
	urlMappingRecord.insert();
}  

]]></script>
